body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
Sometimes it is necessary to start workflow terminating any workflow which is already running. This is especially useful during development and for corn workflows.

**Describe the solution you'd like**
Add WorkflowIDReusePolicyTerminateIfRunning id reuse policy.

**Additional context**
https://github.com/uber/cadence/pull/3215
title: Add WorkflowIDReusePolicyTerminateIfRunning
